document.full_text: the vancouver canucks and san jose sharks may have advanced to the western conference finals but their stanley cup demons have not vanished as memories of past nhl playoff failures continue to haunt both cities.
document.title: canucks and sharks out to exorcise playoff demons
lines_and_colors: the vancouver canucks and san jose sharks may have advanced to the western conference finals but their stanley cup demons have not vanished as memories of past nhl playoff failures continue to haunt both cities.
